actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to reduce the rates of pay of Members of Congress by the amount of the increase taking effect on January 1, 1984, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Declares the rate of pay of Members of Congress to be that which was payable for such office on December 31, 1983.

titles.title: A bill to reduce the rates of pay of Members of Congress by the amount of the increase taking effect on January 1, 1984, and for other purposes.
